sentence: Stacey Abrams initially refused to concede her 2018 loss in the Georgia governor's race to Brian Kemp in part because of actions Kemp had taken as secretary of state overseeing the very election he was competing in, such as purging more than a million voters from the rolls.

title: Who Wants to be a State Secretary of State? Everyone.
